attributes.action: Introduce a banking corporate tax of which is approximately 80%, to ensure that the moneys injected into these institutions are repaid with interest.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
According to the Daily mail £1.3trillion has been pumped into the financial institutions.  The estimated population of the UK is 60million (60x10^6) (national statistics).  This works out to be £21,666.66 per person in the whole of the UK.  

In order to pay for this the banks must take responsibility and pay extra in corporate tax to ensure that when these banks are sold the tax payer will make a decent return on this investment.  The 80% corporate tax can then be removed when these banks are sold.
